summary: A mod to add Guard Followers to Skyrim that will fight for the player.
descriptionHtml:
Adds Nine new, Vanilla Voiced, Guard Followers to Skyrim. One follower for each hold. They will take [i]some[/i]Â searching to find, but aren't too terribly hidden.

Please do not re-upload this mod to any other site.
You may take this mod apart to learn more about how to make simple followers.
If you want to modify the mod for yourself, without uploading it, you may do so.
If you want to upload a modified version of this mod, please ask permission from me, and give credit.
author: yy376
